name: friendly-challenge
description: The client code used for FriendlyCaptcha (widget script, html, styling and webworker solvers)

scripts.build:worker: npm run build:worker:ts && npm run build:worker:compat && npm run build:worker:addpolyfill && npm run build:worker:minify
scripts.build:worker:compat: babel dist/worker.js -o dist/worker.compat.js --config-file ./babel.fa.config.js && babel dist/worker.compat.js -o dist/worker.compat.js
scripts.build:worker:addpolyfill: cat node_modules/promis/promise.js dist/worker.compat.js > dist/worker.compat.poly.js && mv dist/worker.compat.poly.js dist/worker.compat.js && sed -i.bak 's/window/self/g' dist/worker.compat.js && rm dist/worker.compat.js.bak
scripts.build:worker:minify: terser dist/worker.js -o dist/worker.min.js --config-file terser.json --ecma 2017 --toplevel && terser dist/worker.compat.js -o dist/worker.compat.min.js --config-file terser.json --safari10 --toplevel --wrap frcWorker
scripts.build:widget: npm run build:widget:ts && npm run build:widget:compat && npm run build:widget:minify && npm run build:widget:compat:polyfilled
scripts.build:widget:compat: babel dist/widget-pre-babel.js -o dist/widget.js --config-file ./babel.fa.config.js && babel dist/widget.js -o dist/widget.js && rm dist/widget-pre-babel.js
scripts.build:widget:minify: terser dist/widget.module.js -o dist/widget.module.min.js --config-file terser.json --ecma 2017 --module && terser dist/widget.js -o dist/widget.min.js --config-file terser.json --safari10 --toplevel --wrap friendlyChallenge
scripts.build: npm run build:worker && npm run build:widget && npm run build:library && npm run build:html && cp package.json dist/package.json
scripts.dist: npm i && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --ignore-scripts
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "Error: Don't run 'npm publish' in root. Use 'npm run dist' instead." && exit 1

author: Friendly Captcha GmbH <hello@friendlycaptcha.com>
